tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_sales (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
  sale_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drug_sales (
  sale_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  sale_date TIMESTAMP,
  quantity_sold INT
)

CREATE TABLE drug_inventory (
  inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  units_in_stock INT,
  expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sales_report (
	 report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	 drug_id UUID NOT NULL,
	 quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
	 sales_date DATE NOT NULL,
	 FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);
CREATE TABLE drugs (drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_name STRING, manufacturer STRING);
CREATE TABLE sales (sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, sale_date DATE, sale_amount INT);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name STRING, customer_address STRING);
CREATE TABLE sales_representatives (rep_id INT PRIMARY KEY, rep_name STRING, sales_region STRING);

CREATE TABLE drugs (
	drug_id INT NOT NULL,
	drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
	sale_id INT NOT NULL,
	drug_id INT NOT NULL,
	sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
	quantity INT NOT NULL,
	total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (sale_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
	order_id INT NOT NULL,
	customer_id INT NOT NULL,
	sale_id INT NOT NULL,
	order_date DATE NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (order_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (sale_id) REFERENCES sales(sale_id)
);
